Politics of the United States of America

response.answer_text: Many states went into lockdown in Mid-March. Basically all non-essential businesses and schools and public buildings and even many public parks and recreation areas have been closed. Almost everyone is working from home. Of course it’s never enough for some people, but I would say this is the most dramatic response I have ever seen to any event in the United States.

Terrible. The Federal government declared a national emergency but has not done any of its obligations under the law. Only half the people in my state of Michigan are actually practicing social distancing and some of our states have not yet told people to stay home. That’s why so many people are sick and we have no equipment. The great American industrial might has not been brought to bear on this war. It’s getting late.
